data_table.description: AFU Medical History Form, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: AMHA1
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said you had diabetes, or sugar in the blood? Q1 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA2A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had any of the following: kidney stones? Q2a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA2B
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had any of the following: any other kidney disease, apart from a temporary infection? Q2b [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA2C
variable.description: Have you ever had a kidney transplant or been treated with dialysis for more than 6 months? Q2c [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA2D
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said you had hepatitis? Q2d [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA2E
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had any of the following: cirrhosis or other chronic liver disease? Q2e [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA2F
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had any of the following: a thyroid disease, such as hypo- or hyperthyroidism or a goiter? Q2f [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA3
variable.description: Have you ever been diagnosed by a doctor as having gallstones or a gallbladder attack? Q3 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA3B
variable.description: Has your gallbladder been removed? Q3b [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA4
variable.description: Have you ever had a test, for example ultrasound or x-ray, to check for gallstones? Q4 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA5
variable.description: Have you ever had a head injury which led you to see a physician or seek hospital care? Q5 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA6
variable.description: During your lifetime, have you ever used aspirin, or a medicine containing aspirin, on a regular basis? This does not include Tylenol. Q6 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA7
variable.description: Please think back about the time when you FIRST came to the ARIC clinic on [date]. At that time, were you taking aspirin, or a medicine containing aspirin, on a regular basis? Q7 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA7A
variable.description: At that time, which were you taking - aspirin alone or a medicine containing aspirin? Q7a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA7B
variable.description: At that time, which were you taking - aspirin alone or a medicine containing aspirin? What was the brand name? Q7b [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA7D
variable.description: Can you recall what strength of aspirin was in the pill? Was it baby, regular, or extra strength? Q7d [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA8
variable.description: Are you NOW taking aspirin, or a medicine containing aspirin, on a regular basis? Q8 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA10
variable.description: Except aspirin or Tylenol, have you ever used other no steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs or arthritis medicines on a regular basis? Examples include Ibuprofen, Advil, Nuprin, Motrin, Nasprosyn, Feldene and Clinoril. Q10 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA11
variable.description: Please think back about the time when you FIRST came to the ARIC clinic on [date]. At that time, were you taking a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory or arthritis medication on a regular basis? Q11 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA11B
variable.description: What was the brand name of the medicine you were taking at that time? If Other, specify. Q11b [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA11D
variable.description: How many pills per week were you taking, on average, on [FIRST clinic date]? Q11d [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA12
variable.description: Are you now taking a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory or arthritis medication on a regular basis? Q12 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA13
variable.description: Have you ever been pregnant? Q13 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA14
variable.description: Have you ever giving birth? Q14 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA15
variable.description: Have you ever had a mammogram, an x-ray like examination of your breast? Q15 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA16
variable.description: Have you ever had a breast biopsy, by surgery or needle, to remove and examine a small piece of breast tissue? Q16 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA17
variable.description: Have you ever had a mastectomy or lumpectomy to remove part or all of a breast? Q17 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA17A
variable.description: Have you ever had a mastectomy or lumpectomy to remove part or all of a breast? Which breast(s) Q17a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA18
variable.description: Have you ever had breast cancer? Q18 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA18A
variable.description: Have you ever had breast cancer? Which breast(s). Q18a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA19
variable.description: Has your mother, a full sister, or a child had cancer in both breasts? Q19 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA20
variable.description: Have you ever had chemotherapy or radiation treatment for any kind of cancer? Q20 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA21
variable.description: Have you ever had a sigmoidoscopy or colonoscopy to detect an abnormality in your colon, large intestine or rectum? Q21 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA22
variable.description: Have you ever had a stool test for blood to detect cancer of the colon or rectum? Q22 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA23
variable.description: Have you ever been diagnosed by a doctor as having a polyp or noncancerous tumor of the colon or rectum? Q23 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA24
variable.description: The next questions ask about diabetes and cancer in your family. Only full blood relatives should be considered. Do not count half or adopted relatives. Did your mother ever have diabetes, or sugar in the blood? Q24 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA24A
variable.description: Did your mother ever have diabetes, or sugar in the blood? Did this start before or after the age of 30? Q24a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA25
variable.description: Did your mother ever have cancer? Q25 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA25A
variable.description: Did your mother ever have cancer? What types or location of cancer(s)? Q25a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA25B
variable.description: Did your mother ever have cancer? What types or location of cancer(s)? Q25b [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA26
variable.description: Did your father ever have diabetes, or sugar in the blood? Q26 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA26A
variable.description: Did your mother ever have cancer? Did this start before or after the age of 30? Q26a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA27
variable.description: Did your father ever have cancer? Q27 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA27A
variable.description: Did your mother ever have cancer? What types or location of cancer? Q27a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA27B
variable.description: Did your mother ever have cancer? What types or location of cancer? Q27b [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28
variable.description: How many full sisters did you have, living or dead? Q28 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28C
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Location of cancer - sister. Q28c [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28E
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Location of cancer - sister. Q28e [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28G
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Location of cancer - sister. Q28g [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28I
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Location of cancer - sister. Q28i [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28K
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Location of cancer - sister. Q28k [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28M
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Location of cancer - sister. Q28m [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28O
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Location of cancer - sister. Q28o [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28Q
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Location of cancer - sister. Q28q [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29
variable.description: How many full brothers did you have, living or dead? Q29 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29C
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Location of cancer - brother. Q29c [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29E
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Location of cancer - brother. Q29e [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29G
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Location of cancer - brother. Q29g [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29I
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Location of cancer - brother. Q29i [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29K
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Location of cancer - brother. Q29k [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29M
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Location of cancer - brother. Q29m [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29O
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Location of cancer - brother. Q29o [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29Q
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Location of cancer - brother. Q29q [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA30
variable.description: Do you have a brother or a sister diagnosed as having high blood pressure? Q30 [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA1A
variable.description: At what age were you first told you had diabetes? Q1a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA3A
variable.description: At what age were you first told you had a gallbladder problem? Q3a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA5A
variable.description: How many times has this happened? Q5a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA5B
variable.description: How many of these head injuries resulted in your losing consciousness, no matter how briefly? Q5b [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA5C
variable.description: In what year was your last head injury for which you sought medical care? Q5c [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA6A
variable.description: When did you first take aspirin, or a medicine containing aspirin, on a regular basis? Q6a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA7E
variable.description: How many days a week, on average, were you taking aspirin, or a medicine containing aspirin on [date]? Q7e [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA7F
variable.description: How many pills were you taking per week, on average? Q7f [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA8A
variable.description: When did you stop taking aspirin, or a medicine containing aspirin, on a regular basis? Q8a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA10A
variable.description: When did you start taking that medicine on a regular basis? Q10a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA12A
variable.description: When did you stop taking that medicine on a regular basis? Q12a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA13A
variable.description: How old were you when you first become pregnant? Q13a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA14A
variable.description: How old were you when your first child was born? Q14a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA14B
variable.description: What is the total number of months, adding together all children, that you breast fed? Q14b [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA15A
variable.description: In what year was your last mammogram? Q15a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA25C
variable.description: Did your mother ever have cancer? At approximately what age was the (first) cancer diagnosed? Q25c [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA27C
variable.description: Did your mother ever have cancer? At approximately what age was the (first) cancer diagnosis? Q27c [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28A
variable.description: How many sisters, if any, had diabetes, or sugar in the blood? Q28a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28B
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Q28b [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28D
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Age first diagnosed - sister. Q28d [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28F
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Age first diagnosed - sister. Q28f [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28H
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Age first diagnosed - sister. Q28h [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28J
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Age first diagnosed - sister. Q28j [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28L
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Age first diagnosed - sister. Q28l [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28N
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Age first diagnosed - sister. Q28n [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28P
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Age first diagnosed - sister. Q28p [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28R
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? Age first diagnosed - sister. Q28r [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA28S
variable.description: How many sisters had cancer? For how many of your brothers do you feel you really know their medical history? Q28s [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29A
variable.description: How many brothers, if any, had diabetes, or sugar in the blood? Q29a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29B
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Q29b [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29D
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Age first diagnosed - brother. Q29d [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29F
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Age first diagnosed - brother. Q29f [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29H
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Age first diagnosed - brother. Q29h [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29J
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Age first diagnosed - brother. Q29j [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29L
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? How many brothers had cancer? Age first diagnosed - brother. Q29l [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29N
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Age first diagnosed - brother. Q29n [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29P
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Age first diagnosed - brother. Q29p [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29R
variable.description: How many brothers had cancer? Age first diagnosed - brother. Q29r [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA29S
variable.description: For how many of your brothers do you feel you really know their medical history? Q29s [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHAFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA7C
variable.description: At that time, which were you taking - aspirin alone or a medicine containing aspirin? Code. Q7c [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA11C
variable.description: What was the brand name of the medicine you were taking at that time? If Other, specify. Code. Q11c [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHACY
variable.description: Contact year [6, 8, 9] [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: AMHA11A
variable.description: What was the brand name of the medicine you were taking at that time? Q11a [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [AFU Medical History Form, AMH]
